of one sun god, Aton. The bust is at the top of a`` wish list'' of five major artefacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries. Things have been stable since June in China, when Google had its business license renewed, Eric Schmidt said today.`` But you never know; it's possible for the government to cause us to not work.''
